title.rendered: Neos Airline in Somma Lombardo, Italy

content.rendered:
Neos is an Italian airline, headquartered in Somma Lombardo, Lombardy. Neos was established on 22 June 2001, as a joint venture between two tourism companies, the Italian Alpitour S.p.A. and the German TUI Group. Revenue flights were launched on 8 March 2002. In January 2004, Alpitour bought all of TUI Group’s shares, making Neos a fully owned subsidiary of Alpitour no longer affiliated with TUI.

 

Neos Airline in Somma Lombardo, Italy Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: Somma Lombardo, Lombardy, Italy

Phone: NA

Email: customercare@neosair.it

Working hours: Monday to Friday from 09.00 to 18.00

Neos Airline Official website: https://www.neosair.it/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Neos Airline

Total fleet: 13

  • Boeing 737-800
  • Boeing 737 MAX 8
  • Boeing 787-9
  • Boeing 767-300ER

Neos Airline Baggage Allowance

View Neos Airline Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Special Assistance in Neos Airline

Traveling while Pregnant in Neos Airline

  • Neos Airline accept passengers with single pregnancy up to 34 weeks and, for multiple pregnancies up to 28 weeks.
  • From the 28th week to the 34th week a medical certificate is required

For more details: https://www.neosair.it/en/before_the_flight/special_assistance/pregnancy

How to use IATA travel pass in Neos airline?

From 1st May 2021, IATA travel pass has been initiated on the Neos flight NO6080 Milan Malpensa – Tenerife

To participate in the IATA travel pass on Neos flight,

  1. Download IATA Travel Pass in your device (apple (IOS) users)
  2. Sign  up and create an account and enter NEOS code: 564685
  3. Book an appointment for the COVID-19 test.
  4. Once the test result has arrived, your test result will be verified by IATA.
  5. Once verified, passenger will receive an IATA travel pass message as “OK to Travel”
  6. Show the message at the check-in counter on the arrival to the airport.

For more details, visit IATA Travel Pass

Queries handled by Neos Airline Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Neos Airline in Somma Lombardo, Italy Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Neos Airline in Somma Lombardo, Italy: (click on the stars below)
